title: An Interior
marks:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

on verso on verso at top, in pencil: [AN INTERIOR / 1936 PA
description: parlor interior; sofa along wall with figured upholstery and decorative pillows; large picture above; small picture at left; floor vase with potted plants at left; small rounded end table at right; light from window behind camera shadows rugs and sofa
